name: Ninja Jump & Run FREE
description:
Think you're the best ninja around the world? Prove it!
Put your ninja skills to the test and show everyone what you're made of!
You’ll have to jump e run over rotating platforms out there!
The goal of the game is to run as far as you can without falling in the dark!

Have fun with this great cool game! It's totally Free!

"Ninja Jump & Run" is a fast and supper addictive endless arcade game!!!

Features:
- Simple but fun one touch arcade game
- Endless mode, enjoy the fun more
